alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Graves; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 15 at 11:30PM EDT until April 18 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of western Kentucky, including the following areas, Fulton, Graves and Hickman. * WHEN...Until 1215 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1030 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mayfield, Fulton, Hickman, Clinton, Fulgham, Cayce, Sedalia, Lynnville, Wingo, Water Valley, Columbus and Boundurant. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
